title: Thunderbird version 128.11.0esr
content:
I am currently running Thunderbird version 128.11.0esr on Windows 11 on a Dell desktop computer.

I have been running Thunderbird for years. But back in February 2025 my previous Dell desktop died, so had to purchase a new Dell desktop running Windows 11. Then I downloaded Thunderbird and installed it on the new desktop then copied over the profiles that fortunately had been backed up just a week prior. It has been working fine. (When I installed the Thunderbird on the new computer I did not realize there was a difference between ESR (Extended Support Release) channel and Release channel; I just downloaded and installed what I came upon.)

However, around 5/28/25 got a pop-up message that stated something to the effect it is recommended I upgrade to Thunderbird Release.

Should I download and install a new Thunderbird from the Release channel? Will the existing profiles work with the Release channel Thunderbird? Thank you for your help.
creator: jpwvols

title: drag and dropped messages into new folder but they disappeared
content:
I created a new Inbox sub-folder and then selected 19 messages in the Indox and dragged/dropped them into the new folder. They never showed up, but the new folder heading shows there are 19 messages in the folder. If they are there they are not visible. And they are gone from the Inbox.

I can't find a way to search the entire Inbox to see if they are in a different sub-folder, but I've checked the nearby sub-folders and they aren't there. Nor in the Trash or Junk folders. I've also tried the index repair for the new sub-folder and also the Inbox. That didn't help. I also closed out Thunderbird and restarted it, That didn't help either.

Any suggestions? 

John

title: Thunderbird stopped receiving emails from AOL.
content:
Thunderbird stopped receiving emails from AOL. Stopped a few days ago and suddenly started working a few hours later. Now it has stopped for days. I can get my AOL emails by signing into AOL but I prefer receiving them in Thunderbird. I checked to see if my other devices have the same problem - they do. I cannot send messages from Thunderbird AOL account. Thunderbird does work with the Gmail account I have setup inThunderbird. What happened?

I checked with AOL. It appears that Thunderbird can send emails from my AOL (Verizon) account but it can receive them. This is either a Thunderbird issue or an issue with our Internet Service provider (Verizon).

title: Messages on Yahoo server are gone after copying them to my local folders

I'm using other email programs on my mobiles and it's crucial for me that I can access all my folders from mobile and desktop devices. title: Thunderbird as the operating system default under Win 11
content: Hi! I'm trying to set Thunderbird as the operating system default under Win 11. I tried to follow Mozilla's instructions: 1. Open the Settings application by pressing and releasing the Windows Start button, then clicking the gear icon. 2. Click the Apps icon, then click Default Apps in the list. 3. Click the icon under the heading Email to show your choices. 4. Select Thunderbird. The trouble is that at n. 3 there is no choice. There is only 'OutlookAccounts' and this item cannot be deleted or replaced. Can you help? All the best, Robifiori
creator: Robifiori

title: Message: "Choose an application to open the https link", when clicking on help link
content:
Hi Forum I'm back using Thunderbird. The installation was very easy - thanks, and how nice everything is! But I'm trying to import from outlook, where I have some problems, which I hope someone can help me with:

1. I select the Import tool and select "import from Outlook, it now says "No profile found" 2. I then go to the help page: https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/thunderbird-import 3. Here it says: Outlook import requires Outlook to be installed. Thunderbird leverages Outlook to import Outlook data. It is not sufficient to have a .pst file, but Outlook must be installed on your device. 4. But Outlook 2019 is already installed on my pc and works fine, what to do?

a. I then try to import my address book as a csv file. Strange enough I have to map the fields, but ok. b. My problem is that on some of the mapped fields are importet email and mobile phone are not C. What to do

title: Ignoring Notifications from Specific Inboxes
content:

Is there a way to have this indicator only show unread e-mails from a specific inbox, even if the solution requires installing an extension? Thank you in advance.

title: Thunderbird non responsive
content:
Need help with Thunderbird. No matter what I tried always comes back to the same problem.

Problem: Keep getting message non responding. Very buggy, difficult deleting emails (will delete after a prolong period of time > 5 sec). When typing a message there will be no characters then after a short period of time the charterer typed shows up. Sometime without and reason while using Thunderbird it close by itself.

What I have down to solve the problem: 1. Start in safe mode Thunderbird operates as expected with any issues. 2. Win 10 environment, closed all apps and made sure there was no extensions running. Made sure the only app open on the task manger was Thunderbird. NO SOLUTION FOUND 3. Download and install latest version of Thunderbird. NO SOLUTION FOUND 4. Created a new profile file. NO SOLUTION FOUND

Need help, what else is there to try short of a total Nuclear solution?
creator: papa.george.sotiriou

title: Unable to send emails from 2nd and third accounts in Thunderbird
content: I am running Thunderbird ESR 128 as a snap on Ubuntu 24.04. I have several different email accounts and until a couple of days ago, when I replied to an email on account 2 or 3 it was sent as from that particular account. Now it is being sent as if from account 1. Trying to send an email as if from account 2 or 3 results in a failed-to- send message. I have noticed that when I look at the from field for accounts nos 2 and three the following is being inserted before the normal email address "NSIMsgidentity: 1d6 (or 1d7). Can anyone please advise me why this is happening and how to recover the ability to reply / send an email from accounts 2 an 3 as if from those accounts rather than from account 1? Thanks in advance
